The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 September is 318,121 (565.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 September, there were 17,672 new confirmed cases (31.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 September, there were 10,482 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 69% (7190 extra cases).
